name: Mortal Kombat Kollection Online
summary:
A remastered collection of the first 3 games that has been in the news in various forms for years, though a canceled project was confirmed in 2019.

Recently, January 2020, a PEGI rating appeared for the game listing the trilogy for PC and current generation consoles with the blurb:

"Mortal Kombat Kollection Online is the original Mortal Kombat trilogy that MK fans always wanted. Upgraded art, gameplay, and online features provide an incredible experience that revive the "klassics" ..."

The release date listed, January 21st, was obviously incorrect but most games leaked this way are eventually released.
